name: Hover Racer X
description:
Hover Racer X is an ultimate fun of racing. It is an addictive game for the fans of arcade racing and driving simulations. Race at break-neck speeds through an ever-changing landscape. Collect credits as you race, then use them to purchase items in the integrated shop. Nothing is forbidden in Hover Racer X. Racing Fever, More Danger= More Coins! Enjoy the cutting edge 3D Graphics with realistically created environments and amazingly detailed hover cars. Upgrade your hover car and benefit from increased speeds other optimizations. Make it better, faster and stronger. Hover Racer-X is the best mobile racing game that you have been looking for...

Share with your friends & family and compete your HighScore with them...
